Spokane.Elson S. Floyd College of Medicine: The Elson S. Floyd College of Medicine is a recently created public medical school in the northwest United States, based in Spokane, Washington. Founded in 2015, it is affiliated with Washington State University (WSU) of Pullman, and is the second public medical school in the State of Washington. It welcomed its inaugural class in the fall of 2017, joining the University of Washington and Pacific Northwest University of Health Sciences pnwu.edu as one of three medical schools in the state.
